Next.js Boilerplate Docs

Comprehensive Guide for Building SaaS Apps with Our Next.js Boilerplate

Effortless setup. Seamless scalability. Ready for production.

Get Started
Explore the Features
GitHub Repository

Modern Tech Stack

Leverage the power of Next.js 14, TypeScript, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS for building secure, scalable SaaS applications.

Authentication Built-in

NextAuth is pre-configured for seamless OAuth, email, and social media login authentication.

Performance Optimized

Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR) and server-side rendering (SSR) ensure blazing-fast load times and improved SEO.

Developer Friendly

A modular, component-based architecture with out-of-the-box support for customization, ensuring flexibility for your needs.

Ready for Production

Effortlessly deploy to Vercel or any cloud platform with minimal configuration required.

Comprehensive Documentation

Step-by-step guides, API references, and code examples to get you started quickly and efficiently.
